Provider.Name: Youtube
Provider.VideoTemplate: <object width="%width%" height="%height%"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/%video_id%?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/%video_id%?fs=1&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="%width%" height="%height%"></embed></object>
